home.whyLearn.reason: The 1-1 English learning model focuses on encouraging students to confidently communicate in English with their teachers. Based on the students’ level and ability, the teachers will tailor the program and teaching method which best suit the students, enabling them to keep up, rapidly improve their English and make outstanding progress
home.whyLearn.1v1.desc: Học trực tuyến 1 thầy kèm 1 trò, giúp tăng thời gian giao tiếp và tránh mất tập trung
home.whyLearn.studyFromHome.desc: Học ngay tại nhà không cần phải đi xa, tiết kiệm thời gian và an toàn
home.whyLearn.support.desc: Our support team always closely monitor the students' schedule and quality of their classes
home.whyLearn.courseSchedule.desc: Students set their own flexible schedule according to their own timetable, taking the initiative in learning
home.whyLearn.tuition.desc: The most competitive tuition in the market, suitable for each family's budget
home.whyLearn.skills.desc: Improving the 4 main skills, including listening - speaking - reading - writing
home.whyLearn.studyRoute.desc: Lộ trình học áp dụng chuẩn Cambridge, phù hợp với năng lực của từng học viên
home.news.compilers.des: The compilers of EnglishPlus.vn are native teachers with experience in editing documents, including general documents and specialized documents.
